docs.lead_paragraph: The Sickles Brigade encampment is located at Staten Island, about 15 minutes' ride from the lower or Vanderbilt's landing. It may be reached by the Staten Island boats is the landing, and thence by stage or railroad or private conveyance in either case a delightful ride.

docs.snippet: In consequence of the heavy Northeast storm which prevailed yesterday, no further demonstrations in the direction of the Manasses Gap Junction were made by the Federal troops. They were held in readiness, however, to move at a moment's warning, or to...
docs.lead_paragraph: In consequence of the heavy Northeast storm which prevailed yesterday, no further demonstrations in the direction of the Manasses Gap Junction were made by the Federal troops. They were held in readiness, however, to move at a moment's warning, or to repel an attack had one been attempted. The rebels still threaten to move on Alexandria, but they probably have as much as they can attend to in other directions.

A CHRISTIAN PHALANX, THE EXCELSIOR BRIGADE AT CAMP SCOTT. FUNERAL OF HENRY C. CORNELL. THE THIRTY SEVENTH REGIMENT AT THE BATTERY. COL. WILSON'S REGIMENT. THE NINTH REGIMENT N.Y.S.M. THE COMMISSARY-GENERAL'S DEPARTMENT. COL. INNES' REGIMENT. THE BELMONT CAVALRY TROOP A CORRECTION.

docs.lead_paragraph: The valuable aid afforded by this Society of experienced medical men and their willing assistants is daily realized by our troops. Their plans are so admirably adjusted that at a moment's notice a Committee of instruction will be sent with models and patterns to aid the efforts of cooperative societies. Articles which have been found to be most useful and of the proper material are constantly on exhibition and open to inspection.
